title: Israeli lithium-ion battery offers EV full charge in five minutes
lead: The battery enables full charge in five minutes providing up to 300Km of driving range

title: Robots to dismantle nuclear power stations
lead: The £12 million-project will see long-reach robotic arms deliver faster and safer decommissioning of reactors in Japan and the UK

title: Portsmouth City Council wins £3.1m fund for home energy efficiency
lead: Up to 300 additional households across Portsmouth and Gosport are to benefit from the funding

title: All new build homes in the UK to be ‘zero carbon ready’ by 2025
lead: Under the new regulations, new buildings will produce 80% lower carbon emissions compared to current levels

title: Ireland consults on new support scheme for microgeneration technologies
lead: Consumers would be able to generate their own renewable electricity – for example from solar panels on their roofs – and receive a ‘fair price’ when they sell the excess to the grid

title: Volkswagen tripled sales of electric vehicles in 2020
lead: The most popular model was the ID.3, with 56,500 units sold, even though it only came on the market in September

title: Natural History Museum part of consortium to make lithium in the UK
lead: Two projects in Cornwall and Scotland are claimed to be at the forefront of the UK’s battery industry

title: Balls of seagrass could help kick microplastics out of the sea
lead: Seagrass forms balls that have the potential to capture 867 million pieces of plastic annually

title: North South divide when it comes to on-street EV charging
lead: Almost 126 councils have no plans to install any more EV chargers than they already have by 2025, according to new research

title: Britain’s smart meter installations in 2020 at lowest level since 2016
lead: Coronavirus outbreak impacted smart meter installations which dropped by 27% last year, according to a new report
